casebody.data:
IN RE: J.B. 335P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2018 Geeta Kapur, Attorney at Law, for J.B. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, Janelle Varley, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of October 2018 by Juvenile to Appoint the Appellate Defender:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of October 2018."
